name: Vomit Up The World
description:
You will find yourself in a tiny box. To get out of it you need to eat yellow gems with which you will grow. There's one question: How far can you go? 

How to Play

What to do  Travel and discover new worlds eating yellow gems! You can't die in this game. 

Just enjoy!

Controls

‘WASD’ - arrows ‘Up’, ‘Down’, ‘Left’, ‘Right’.

Made for Ludum Dare 49 (Theme: "Unstable")
